figures.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
figures.description: American Baptist minister and activist who became the most visible spokesperson in the civil rights movement.
achievements: Youngest Nobel Peace Prize winner at the time
figures.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.

figures.name: Nelson Mandela
figures.description: South African anti-apartheid revolutionary and political leader who served as President of South Africa from 1994 to 1999.
achievements: Imprisoned for 27 years for fighting apartheid
First democratically elected President of South Africa
Symbol of peace and reconciliation worldwide
figures.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

figures.name: Harriet Tubman
figures.description: American abolitionist and political activist who escaped slavery and made 13 missions to rescue enslaved people using the Underground Railroad.
achievements: First woman to lead an armed assault during the Civil War
Worked as a spy for the Union Army
Dedicated later life to women's suffrage
figures.quote: I freed a thousand slaves. I could have freed a thousand more if only they knew they were slaves.

figures.name: Kwame Nkrumah
figures.description: Ghanaian politician and revolutionary who became the first Prime Minister and President of Ghana, leading the country to independence.
achievements: Led Ghana to independence from Britain in 1957
Established the Organization of African Unity
Advocated for African unity and socialism
figures.quote: We face neither East nor West: we face forward.

figures.name: Bob Marley
figures.description: Jamaican singer, songwriter, and musician who became an international icon for his reggae music and Rastafari message.
achievements: United warring political factions in Jamaica
figures.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.

figures.name: Maya Angelou
figures.description: American poet, memoirist, and civil rights activist known for her series of seven autobiographies.
achievements: Author of 'I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings'
Recited poem at President Clinton's inauguration
figures.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.

figures.name: Toussaint Louverture
figures.description: Haitian general and leader of the Haitian Revolution, the only successful slave revolt in history.
achievements: Led the only successful slave revolution
Transformed Haiti into a free state
Defeated French, Spanish, and British forces
figures.quote: I was born a slave, but nature gave me the soul of a free man.

figures.name: Wangari Maathai
figures.description: Kenyan environmental and political activist who founded the Green Belt Movement.
achievements: First African woman to win Nobel Peace Prize
Planted over 51 million trees in Africa
First woman in East Africa to earn a doctorate
figures.quote: Until you dig a hole, you plant a tree, you water it and make it survive, you haven't done a thing.

figures.name: Marcus Garvey
figures.description: Jamaican political activist, publisher, journalist, and orator who founded the Universal Negro Improvement Association.
achievements: Founded UNIA with millions of members
Created the Black Star Line shipping company
figures.quote: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.

figures.name: Chinua Achebe
figures.description: Nigerian novelist, poet, and critic regarded as the father of African literature in English.
achievements: Over 20 million copies sold of his works
Transformed how the world sees African literature
figures.quote: The world is like a Mask dancing. If you want to see it well, you do not stand in one place.

figures.name: Fela Kuti
figures.description: Nigerian multi-instrumentalist, bandleader, and activist who pioneered Afrobeat music.
figures.quote: Music is the weapon of the future.

figures.name: Miriam Makeba
figures.description: South African singer and civil rights activist known as 'Mama Africa'.
achievements: First African artist to win a Grammy
Exiled from South Africa for 31 years
figures.quote: Girls are the future mothers of our society, and it is important that we focus on their well-being.

figures.name: Usain Bolt
figures.description: Jamaican former sprinter, widely considered the greatest sprinter of all time. World record holder in 100m and 200m.
achievements: First athlete to hold both 100m and 200m world records simultaneously
figures.quote: I don't think limits.

figures.name: Serena Williams
figures.description: American former professional tennis player, widely regarded as the greatest female tennis player of all time.
achievements: Held World No. 1 ranking for 319 weeks
Most Grand Slam titles in singles, doubles, and mixed combined
figures.quote: I really think a champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.

figures.name: LeBron James
figures.description: American professional basketball player, widely considered one of the greatest players in NBA history.
figures.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.

figures.name: Muhammad Ali
figures.description: American professional boxer and activist, nicknamed 'The Greatest'. Three-time world heavyweight champion.
achievements: Refused Vietnam draft on religious grounds
figures.quote: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

figures.name: Pelé
figures.description: Brazilian professional footballer, widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time.
achievements: Named FIFA Player of the Century
figures.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice.

figures.name: Michael Jordan
figures.description: American former professional basketball player, widely considered the greatest basketball player of all time.
achievements: Created Air Jordan brand worth billions
figures.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.

figures.name: Simone Biles
figures.description: American artistic gymnast, the most decorated gymnast in World Championship history.
figures.quote: I'm not the next Usain Bolt or Michael Phelps. I'm the first Simone Biles.

figures.name: Beyoncé
figures.description: American singer, songwriter, and businesswoman. One of the best-selling music artists of all time.
achievements: First Black woman to headline Coachella
figures.quote: I don't like to gamble, but if there's one thing I'm willing to bet on, it's myself.

figures.name: Rihanna
figures.description: Barbadian singer, businesswoman, and actress. One of the best-selling music artists with her Fenty empire.
achievements: First Black woman to head LVMH luxury house
figures.quote: There's something so special about a woman who dominates in a man's world.

figures.name: Kendrick Lamar
figures.description: American rapper and songwriter, widely regarded as one of the most influential hip-hop artists of his generation.
achievements: Pulitzer Prize for Music (first for hip-hop)
Albums 'DAMN.' and 'To Pimp a Butterfly' critically acclaimed
figures.quote: I got loyalty, got royalty inside my DNA.

figures.name: Chadwick Boseman
figures.description: American actor known for playing Black Panther and iconic figures like Jackie Robinson and James Brown.
achievements: Portrayed Jackie Robinson, James Brown, Thurgood Marshall
figures.quote: The only difference between a hero and a villain is that the villain chooses to use that power in a way that is selfish.

figures.name: Lupita Nyong'o
figures.description: Kenyan-Mexican actress known for her roles in '12 Years a Slave', 'Black Panther', and 'Us'.
achievements: Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
First Kenyan and Mexican actress to win an Oscar
figures.quote: No matter where you're from, your dreams are valid.

figures.name: Idris Elba
figures.description: British actor, producer, and DJ known for 'The Wire', 'Luther', and 'Thor' films.
achievements: Officer of the Order of the British Empire
figures.quote: I'm into fairness, kindness, compassion—the things that make you a good person.

figures.name: Viola Davis
figures.description: American actress and producer, first African American to achieve the 'Triple Crown of Acting'.
achievements: Academy Award, Emmy, and Tony winner (EGOT pending)
First African American Triple Crown of Acting
figures.quote: The only thing that separates women of color from anyone else is opportunity.

figures.name: Denzel Washington
figures.description: American actor and filmmaker, widely regarded as one of the greatest actors of his generation.
achievements: Cecil B. DeMille Lifetime Achievement Award
First Black actor to win two Academy Awards
figures.quote: Dreams without goals are just dreams.

figures.name: Oprah Winfrey
figures.description: American talk show host, media executive, and philanthropist. First Black female billionaire in the United States.
achievements: The Oprah Winfrey Show ran 25 seasons
figures.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

figures.name: Naomi Campbell
figures.description: British supermodel, actress, and businesswoman. One of the original 'Big Six' supermodels.
achievements: First Black model on cover of French Vogue
Pioneer for diversity in fashion industry
figures.quote: I make my own rules.

figures.name: Eddie Murphy
figures.description: American actor and comedian, one of the highest-grossing actors of all time.
achievements: Mark Twain Prize for American Humor
figures.quote: The advice I would give to someone is to not take anyone's advice.

figures.name: Trevor Noah
figures.description: South African comedian and television host, former host of The Daily Show.
achievements: Host of The Daily Show for 7 years
figures.quote: Learn from your past and be better because of your past, but don't cry about your past.
